name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Zefiel, atticusonline, dinner, lk, Satur9)

name: hellofditties
text: I think you made a good point there sir.  Shame I had to up my lame threshold to see it.

name: wite_rabit
text: Agreed.

name: hellofditties
text: Chubbied for solidarity.

name: tonyhighwind
text: I, too, am part of the Asherdan Ain't All That Big a Dick, Really club.

name: epicurus
text: I'd listen to it if it were well-priced.

name: hellofyellin
text: A good price for this would be a dime bag full of Ajax that you tell Todd is a bag of "Cuban Jackhammer Fancy-Cut" cocaine.

name: rowboat
text: Or you could just tell him that it was Ajax. He wouldn't turn his nose up at that. He would turn his nose all up in that.

name: laserblade
text: Are you talking about literally $10 worth of Ajax, in a bag? This is an important question as that is quite a lot of Ajax

name: deusoma
text: You would only need as much Ajax as would look like $10 worth of coke, which I suspect is significantly less Ajax.

name: hellofyellin
text: Correct.

name: jlynes
text: I have the feeling that the only place to purchase Todd's audiobook is in the cardboard 99 cent bin at the truck stop.

name: rogergs
text: For the Achewood romance-novel completist.

name: spinynorman
text:
To be honest, if you're willing to buy one harlequin romance novel penned by a fictional character on an online webcomic, you are probably going to be willing to by them all.

Internet is the largest cult of all.

name: djlockjaw
text: Todd can't read. Ron Jeremy is awesome. Two new facts from Chris today!

name: youfailme
text: What about Todd's license plate cover? Didn't it say Todd couldn't read in that strip?

name: deusoma
text: Yes... and this strip does nothing to counter that fact.

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, TonyHighwind, Bourbonsamurai, SotiCoto)

name: riotdejaneiro
text:
How can someone that hilariously creepy not be awesome?

Today's your lucky day, pal!

name: evolume
text: are there many books-on-tape on Soulseek?

name: sirfrederick
text: Yes, many.

name: soticoto
text: Todd's romance novel is winning by several laps of awesome so far.

name: fosters
text: What I like about this is that apparently Todd and Blister just drive around listening to this. Like it's just the standard cruising music for their van.

name: heccibiggs
text: Hahahahaha that is hilarious. Just imagine that happening. Imagine it now.

name: spinynorman
text:
I think I just figured out how to weird the everliving shit out of a blind date. Slam on a self-made romance novel recording and just periodically look over at her, smile, and nod.

You may want to have those furry seat belt cover-things, you don't want her to chafe when she tears her clothes off from overwhelming arousal.

name: tekende
text: She will be tearink her panties off with both hands.

name: smilebuddha
text: Until she is so nude.

name: softerworld
text: He gained some notoriety for being capable of autofellatio but he has since stated in a 2003 interview that all he can do these days is kiss the tip of his penis due to his weight gain.

name: gethen
text: what a romantic

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Well relationships do tend to cool down over the years....

name: ham_shoes
text: Your comment is tragically underappreciated.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: perhaps it is for the best

name: tekende
text: It seems to give him energy.

name: dusty
text: As overrated as that ability probably is, its probably far less valuable to someone for whom half their job is getting blow jobs from people who are experts at it.

name: drago25
text:
Ahhh, I've been waiting for a Ron Jeremy reference.
Good night world

name: heccibiggs
text: This is hell of underrated, it's clearly genius. Just imagine if all audiobooks were like this.

name: canusdivinus
text: Romance novel, porno, whatever, Todd doesn't know the difference.

name: aelindil
text: The difference between them is subtle, and the unreality level is about the same.

name: caseyb3
text: 'TELL THE [READERS] WHY IT IS LUCKY THAT RON JEREMY IS THERE' is my motto (for writing)

name: paperboy_2000
text: The one exception to the writer's "Don't tell, show" rule is Ron Jeremy.

name: tekende
text: Ron Jeremy is the exception to every rule, ever.

name: tonyhighwind
text: No matter what Todd does, it involves a van without windows.

name: redion
text: I imagine Blister's voice as the Watcher thing from Venture Brothers. "IGNORE ME!"

name: mangtastic
text: I am guessing it wouldn't sound as tinny and robotic though, but otherwise YES

name: ham_shoes
text: Todd's cassettes must be pretty small.
